Posts.Content: Mar 18, 2014 10:05PM Barncat wrote: Yes, I ended up with a rash on my left breast incision. We were so busy concentrating on  my right breast incision that had opened up, and I ended up in the hospital for a week, that I just thought it was a part of the scar at first.   My rash ended up being Psoriasis.  The reaction I had was refered to as Koebner phenomenon.  I had issues with Psoriasis being caused by stress in the past, but sure never thought I'd have a reaction like that on my breast!  A cortisteroid cream from my dermatologist got rid of it for me.
Posts.Title: Thoughts on rash on/around/up from Mastectomy incision 1toughmomma 1toughmomma
